column2: bass_model_fit <- nls(sales_data ~ m * (((p + q)^2 / p) * exp(-(p + q) * time_sequence)) /
control = nls.control(maxiter = 100, minFactor = 1/1024, printEval = TRUE, warnOnly = TRUE))

sales_data ~ m * (((p + q)^2/p) * exp(-(p + q) * time_sequence))/(1 + 
    (q/p) * exp(-(p + q) * time_sequence))^2
